scripts.test:comprehensive: npm run clean:allure && wdio run wdio.conf.ts --spec ./test/specs/retryDemo.e2e.ts; wdio run wdio.conf.ts --spec ./test/specs/scenario1-allPass.e2e.ts; wdio run wdio.conf.ts --spec ./test/specs/scenario3-specFails.e2e.ts; wdio run wdio.conf.ts --spec ./test/specs/scenario4-suiteFails.e2e.ts; export GLOBAL_HOOK_FAIL=1 && wdio run wdio.conf.ts --spec ./test/specs/scenario2-globalFails.e2e.ts; npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:validate
